There are 5 sites using Pombola, our parliamentary monitoring software

In Ghana, South Africa, Nigeria, Zimbabwe and Kenya.

21,266 Politicians monitored
by the 5 Pombola sites

Pombola provides a platform so you can list politicians, show their activity in parliament and help people contact them.

2014: The year of Mzalendo

Mzalendo, the Kenyan Pombola site, had over 25,000 visitors per month in 2014.

It also awarded People’s Shujaaz Awards to Kenya’s 10 best representatives, and earned a £14,714 grant from the Indigo Trust.
